parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attaches a script to a scripted waypoint. In early versions of Arma, command consisted of a script name and additional script arguments and the script had to use [[SQS]]-Syntax. The script receives the following arguments in [[Magic Variables#this|_this]] variable: [group, position, target] + [the optional passed arguments]. The optional arguments are [[append]]ed to the end of the arguments array.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>In Arma 3, ''command'' argument can be a reference to .sqf script (it will have to explicitly end with '''.sqf''') or a reference to .sqs script.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint [[setWaypointScript]] command

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> command: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[setWaypointScript]] "find.sqs [[player]]";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[setWaypointScript]] "somescript.sqf [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8]";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]]
</value></part></template>
